ref: 5145 jára m. ʻ wearing out ʼ RV., ʻ *old ʼ cf. ajára -- ʻ not aging ʼ RV., jaraṇḍa -- ʻ old ʼ lex. 2. *jaratha -- , cf. jaraṭha -- ʻ old ʼ BhP. &rcirclemacr 1. Pa. jara -- in cmpds. ʻ worn out, old ʼ; Pk. jara -- , f. ˚rī -- , jaraḍa -- , jaraṁḍa -- ʻ old ʼ, Sh. gil. koh. ǰărŭ, f. ǰĕˊri, gur. žărŭ, Or. jara; M. j̈arḍī, j̈arãḍī f. ʻ old woman ʼ; Si. diriti ʻ decrepit old woman ʼ (+ strīˊ -- ?).
L. jahrā m. ʻ old man ʼ, jahrī f. ʻ old woman ʼ or < *jasara -- .
